title: New: astronomyy – Drivin Me Crazy
content:
I’ll be honest for a second here.

I think when I wrote about astronomyy’s (previously known as Astro Aaron) previous two tracks, I got caught up in the hype somewhat. Listening back to the two tracks in question, and whilst the production is squeaky clean, and the whole aesthetic just screams out for blog-buzz, there’s very to actually become enthralled with. What I’m trying to say is that the songwriting is average to poor, and they’re very much style over substance, as harsh as that may sound.

So, step up Drivin Me Crazy, astronomyy’s first track in a couple of months, and it’s a marked improvement in quality; there’s a self-assured confidence that his previous two outings lacked. Instead of merely taking a sound and style that already exists and has been copied to death, astronomyy is beginning to forge his own aesthetic, alongside the dramatic strides in his songwriting ability. Check out Drivin Me Crazy below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
